original_text: Or is it only Barnabas and I who have no right to refrain from working for a living?
korean_text: 어찌 나와 바나바만 일하지 아니할 권리가 없겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Or is it only Barnabas and I
who have no right to refrain from working for a living?
sentences.korean_translation: 생계를 위해 일하지 않을 권리가 없다는 것입니까?
